DOC.brief_summary: For primary surgical treatment prostate cancer investigator compare classic open surgery ( radical retropubic prostatectomy , RRP ) versus robot-assisted laparoscopic surgery ( RALP ) . Oncological result obtain standard follow-up consultation Prostate-Specific Antigen ( PSA ) measurement detect biochemical recurrence . Functional result ( continence , potency , quality life ) obtain standardised questionnaire . Currently investigator perform prostatectomy robot-assisted manner . For result open surgery investigator send questionnaires patient operation past .
DOC.brief_title: Oncological Functional Outcomes After Radical Prostatectomy Prostate Cancer : Comparing Open With Robot-assisted Surgery
DOC.criteria: prostate cancer radical retropubic prostatectomy robotassisted laparoscopic surgery
